query.script: INSERT INTO sapin.taxon_vernacular_name ( taxon_id, name, language, rank ) SELECT taxon_id, name, language, rank FROM ( SELECT taxon_id, ?vernacularName, coalesce(?language, '_'), rank FROM sapin.tmp_taxon_id_src_id_asso WHERE src_id = ?taxonID ) v (taxon_id, name, language, rank) WHERE taxon_id IS NOT NULL ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
